backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with workout, exercise, recovery, and user profile types plus an embedded exercise library.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that maps an old actor state to a new actor state with unchanged fields.
feature_evidence.json: Contains metadata describing a feature removal with affected files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of multiple frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Logs deployment retry attempts documenting backend filter fixes and build triggers.
frontend/index.html: Provides the main HTML document with PWA configuration, meta tags, and app bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines the PWA manifest with app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements the root React component handling authentication flow, page routing, workout validation, and lazy-loaded pages.
Modal for updating the user's bodyweight and unit with validation and profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with tab buttons and a settings modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal for selecting and recording an alternative exercise, fetching recommendations and updating backend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, settings button, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements custom pull‑to‑refresh gesture with touch handling and refresh callback.
Displays muscle recovery data with loading states and optional weighted leg average.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Modal for editing and saving user profile settings such as gender, bodyweight, units, dark mode, and rest intervals.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen animated splash screen showing a dumbbell icon and app title.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Sticky top bar displaying the user’s daily streak and today’s date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal that generates a QR code and provides sharing and copy‑link options for a workout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Empty placeholder file for a backend actor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React‑query hooks for backend interactions, with default profile values, validation helpers, and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook to manage the Screen Wake Lock API with automatic reacquisition, cleanup, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, enforced dark theme variables, mobile typography, safe-area utilities, and page interaction utilities.
frontend/src/lib/profileCache.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, validate, and clear workout session state in sessionStorage with a 24‑hour expiry.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utility functions for detecting nanosecond timestamps, validating ranges, and formatting dates with optional time.
Builds ordered workout sections from exercises, grouping major muscle groups and creating leg subsections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing history, recovery, and user stats with pull‑to‑refresh and nanosecond timestamp handling.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays full workout history with timestamp conversion, volume formatting, and a calendar of trained dates.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the FitTrack login screen with app branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Lets users choose a workout type and triggers workout generation via backend hooks, then returns the generated plan.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects user profile details such as gender, weight, and training settings and saves them through a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Shows recovery status and weekly training volume using backend queries, with pull‑to‑refresh support and visual indicators.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and displays a generated workout, allows regenerating or changing exercises, and prepares users to start a session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Manages an active workout session including sets, timers, logging, PR detection, exercise changes, and workout saving.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for exercises, workouts, recovery data, and related frontend-only fitness tracking structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature statuses, and pending requests related to removing TEST_RECOVERY_MODE logic.
